content: HLC-H Sleeve anchor Economical sleeve anchor (hex bolt head) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Variety of lengths and sizes for a multitude of applications Pre-assembled anchor for easy and fast installation Hexagon head Easily removable, ideal for temporary fastenings Imprint in the sleeve that shows the drill bit required Applications Suitable for a large range of temporary applications, fixing of small devices etc. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Head configuration: Hex head Environmental conditions: Indoor, dry conditions Approvals / Test reports: N/A Technical Data | Head configuration | Hex head | Environmental conditions | Indoor, dry conditions | Approvals / Test reports | N/A | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, zinc-plated | Type of fixing | Through-fastening ### ITEMS- 336259 -
